Hundreds of motorcyclists to stop in Tuscaloosa Tuesday en route to Memorial Day in D.C. TUSCALOOSA , Alabama -- Hundreds of travelers on motorcycles will stop at the VA Medical Center in Tuscaloosa Tuesday to spend time with veterans and rest for a short time before saddling back up and heading toward Washington D.C. to observe Memorial Day next week .

The riders are expected to arrive between 10 and 11 a.m. , at which point supportive citizens , veterans and the staff of the clinic will line the route to the medical center and welcome the men and women to Tuscaloosa .
